name: ANIMATED MONOPOLY
description:
The classic board-game of Monopoly  in adventure mode.

There are 3 levels:

the sky with the coins to take

the normal way with the classic game (contracts, house, tax, ...)

the hell way, where you can die!

You can play pressing SPACEBAR to jump (in windows version)

In Android version: "J"  button  (to  jump) and "Arrow" button (to move)
